Reviews.Title: Samsung TL 220
Reviews.Author: Kelly J. Cline
Reviews.Content: I bought the Samsung TL 220 and just love it. It takes good and clear pictures. And has so many features that the other cameras don't have. I have not had any problems with my camera and would highly recommend this camera to all camera lovers. Only one little downfall, the battery goes quicker than other cameras but I assume that is because it is all touchscreen and would drain the battery quicker. Other than that I love it.

Reviews.Title: solid camera
Reviews.Author: kb
Reviews.Content: The Samsung TL 220 worked well for us on a recent trip.  It took great pictures, especially in low light.  We ended up turning off the flash for most pictures, even at night, and they came out better than with a flash.  Touch screen was responsive and easy to use.I was worried about battery life, and the battery indicator can sometimes be erratic, quickly going from fully charged to no charge in an instant, and then returning to fully charged.  I'm still not sure why that happened, but the battery did last through a couple of large museums (150 photos, most without flash).  I would still make sure the battery is fully charged each time before heading out.Couple other quirks:  the charging cord is very short and since you have to charge the battery while inside the camera, you have to search around for an outlet that's close to a surface where you can rest the camera.  The front screen is nice, but it made me wish I had longer arms in taking some of our self portrait shots to get all the desired background into the photo.  You also have to concentrate on looking at the lens, not the front screen, or your eyes will look off to the side in the photo.  The micro SD card is a bit of an inconvenience - a standard SD card would have been easier.All in all, we found the camera easy and fun to use, and we have some amazing photos from our trip.  Amazon service was great as well!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Dual-screen 12mp camera
Reviews.Author: Rene Devon Singh
Reviews.Content: Camera arrived in satisfactory time and in good condition. The Samsung dual screen is an excellent camera the pictures are sharp and clear and the face recognition and image stabilization work great. The view screen is large and bright and doubles as a touch screen interface which is responsive but takes some getting use too. More thought could have been put into the manual because the instructions are vague and useless or total absent on using the numerous functions that the camera apparently has. Manual aside the camera is excellent and the outer screen is sheer genius. It allows for perfect self portraits and couples who don't want to hand their camera to a stranger every time they want an intimate picture while on a date. There are also settings which use the outer screens to help keep the attention of less than cooperative photo subjects (e.g. babies or ppl with short attention spans). All is all this camera is more than worth the price tag and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Not reliable
Reviews.Author: Strike Z "Strike Z"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera for our daughter.  In the last five months it has been returned to Samsung three times.  Each time it takes about a month to send in, get it checked and returned.  The first time the back screen stopped working, the second time the from screen stopped working.  The last time the lens would not detract nor the camera come on.  They claimed it had physical damage, they charged us $90 for the repair.  When we got it back, within two days the lens did the same thing.

Reviews.Title: Excellant Camera. Highly Recommend if shopping for a Camera
Reviews.Author: Ward "WardnTX"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. One of the best I have ever owned or used.  The pictures it takes are fantastic. I got mine on sale for $259.00. Shop around for the best price but definitely choose this camera if you are shopping for a camera and want one that is just point and shoot and will automatically take the perfect shot both day and night.

Reviews.Title: Love the features
Reviews.Author: K. Rogers "shopping mom"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for Christmas and I love it! It comes with a stylus to tap the screen to add effects and edit pictures on the screen. Plus, the screen on the front makes taking pictures of my friends and I SO much easier than my last camera! There is also a smile recognition feature where the camera takes a picture automatically when you smile. I'm sure there are a lot more features I haven't even discovered yet! Buy this camera!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Features!
Reviews.Author: Waleska Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome.  I bought this for my daughter's 19th birthday a couple of weeks ago and she is still exploring all of it's numerous features.  The touchscreen is wonderful and the quality of the pictures are amazing.  I especially like the option to change the resolution of your pictures and the clear crisp quality of the pictures, also the lighting and color quality is that of a professional photographer's camera.  The only glitch I can mention is with the child mode feature Samsung offers on their website files to download videos and that is a little confusing but other than that it's great.  I do recommend however that you purchase this camera for a serious picture taker, I don't recommend this camera for a child or a very young teenager as it's many features may be overwhelming which may dissuade them from taking advantage of them.

Reviews.Title: Super fun camera but not the best pictures
Reviews.Author: Hoog
Reviews.Content: This camera is really fun. The second view finder in front has been great. I use it all the time and I am already getting really good at positioning it for a great shot.All the extra features like smile finder, face recognition, and in-camera editing seem pretty useless to me but some might like them.BE WARNED: It takes a mini-SD card and at 12mp pictures you need a big one.Two disadvantages:1. The pictures are not as clear as I think they should be. I got better photos with my last pocket camera (Casio exlim), albeit cost twice as much. This is pretty important; it is a camera after all.2. It feels a little flimsy but it hasn't broken. It just feels a little less durable than me last one.Overall:If you're like me and want something that will fit in your front pocket and can come out anytime anywhere for family and friends photos this is a good choice. Plus with the view finder I get to be in a lot more of the photos.

Reviews.Title: After 10 months of use I regret purchasing it!
Reviews.Author: J9Detroit
Reviews.Content: I'm updating my initial review from March. I've been using this camera for 10 months now and I really have begun to hate it. I regret purchasing it and I'm considering selling it. I read a lot of reviews before I bought it and thought I was making a good decision but not anymore. So far any attempts at using the "features" of the camera have caused more problems then they're worth.  I've lost many pictures from my vacations and events due to file error which I don't realize until hours later when I decide to view the pictures I've taken.  These file errors usually happen when I try to use any of the features aside from the standard point and shoot. The camera is terrible at night shots. The flash is not strong enough and when you try to use the night/low light feature the picture doesn't even come out at all. The hook feature of taking a picture of yourself by using the view finder on the front of the camera to frame your shot doesn't work correctly and after many attempts at trying to get it right I've just given up. It's also been having problems freezing up on the screen after you take a picture and the front view finders stays stuck on even when you have turned it off.  Save your money and purchase one of the more reliable cameras - you'll be glad you did!*****************************************************I bought this camera mainly because I wanted the "hook" feature which is to take pictures of yourself by using the viewfinder on the front of the camera. I have to say that I'm not really crazy about the feature now that I have the camera.  Maybe I just need more practice to get it right but I found that the pictures I take that way are not right in terms of where you look into the camera to take the picture and the focus of the people in the picture. What I found though after using it was that I really like the camera overall. It's got some cool features and is very easy to use.  Some cons are: the price - it's definitely more expensive than many small point and shoot cameras out there and I'm sure that has more to do with that cool hook feature than anything else. It's a fingerprint magnet due to it's shiny surface. I really do miss having a view finder to look into in order to frame my shot vs. just the large viewer screen especially on sunny days because you have no idea what you're taking pictures of when there is a glare on the screen. The cord to charge it and download pictures to your computer is VERY short. Not sure why it's so short but it can be a huge problem if you're not close to the outlet you're plugging it into. If I plug it into the wall the camera will barely touch the floor. It's really THAT short. I thought the micro memory card would be a problem but it really hasn't been, mostly because instead of taking the card out to transfer pictures to your computer you actually just use the USB to connect to your computer for downloading. I wish it came with a full owners manual instead of having to download the pdf manual. I'm sure there are many features I haven't used yet just because I don't have that manual as a reference guide.  All in all it's a great little camera and it takes really good pictures. It's very slim and small and holds a battery charge for a fairly long time. Not sure the hook feature is worth the extra money though.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: K. Camargo
Reviews.Content: Works great... was just what i expected. Anyone who sees it really likes it a lot

Reviews.Title: Big waste of my money
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: I was really disappointed with this camera. I wish I had returned it. I went and bought a new (and cheaper) Nikon which I use instead.Here were my problems with it:Once you push the button to take a picture, it takes a couple seconds to take it. This is a dealbreaker for me with a camera. The five-year-old camera that I was replacing took pictures immediately.The pictures have different dimensions than most cameras. So if you get your pictures developed at 4x6, you will either need to edit all the pictures first to crop them yourself, or risk peoples heads being chopped off. The dimensions are not a problem if you just look at your pictures on a computer. They are the dimensions of HDTV.The ONLY reason I bought this camera was because of the front display. I am going on vacation with my boyfriend and wanted to take great pictures of the two of us in front of the Eiffel tower, etc. This feature let me down because the touch screen is so large on the back that when I turn it around I tend to accidentally touch it and mess with the settings. Also, since it takes so long to take the picture, someone usually does something weird with their face before the picture actually takes.I did not find the use of this camera's menus, etc., to be intuitive. I am in my early twenties and can usually figure out new technology easily, and using this was frustrating. I absolutely do not recommend this product and I will never buy a Samsung again.

Reviews.Title: Very lousy photo quality
Reviews.Author: Jonathan J. Kim "Tinker"
Reviews.Content: this is a "camera" and it takes lousy photos. All fuzzy and unfocused and very very poor quality photos. Very frustrated and upset and the poor quality of the camera. Even with all the features, what good is a camera that does take good photo. Very lousy product. Stay the far away from it. Total waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: AJ "anjanetteu"
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome camera especially for taking easy point and shoot photos.  This camera is totally dumb-proof...anyone can figure it out.I recently used it for my grad school graduation and it took perfect pictures.  Even my 6 year old niece took excellent pictures with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Captured Memories
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: This Samsung camara is one of my best buys.  I have two young boys and I love to capture the many moments as they are happening.  I have never owned another brand other than Olympus in the past so I was having a hard time with this purchase decision.  While Olympus is also a great quality camara, I love this new Samsung.  The touch screen is great and works very well!  The screen on the front is so fun and the boys love it.  It helps me to have their focus as they love to see them selves as they are getting captured.

Reviews.Title: samsung camera
Reviews.Author: t3peoples "t3peoples"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  My first touchscreen and hopefully my last it does all the the things I want my camers to do plus many extras.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TL220
Reviews.Author: A. Mithavayani "LTA 4"
Reviews.Content: This was a great investment. I needed a new digital camera and this one is great. I wish it was skinnier like the newer Samsung cameras though. The front and back screens make it convenient to take pictures of myself or friends. There are lots of features like beauty shop and fireworks that are great for special occasions. I am very happy with my purchase and would recommend this camera to anyone looking for the latest in technology.

Reviews.Title: High on the novelty factor, but nothing too exciting beyond that
Reviews.Author: Michael A. Duvernois
Reviews.Content: Yes, there's an LCD screen on the front, so if you put this on a tripod with a self-timer, you can all get into the picture. If that's important to you, then this is your camera. To me it was a novelty as how hard is it to hop into a spot you have picked out for yourself in the picture? Or maybe folks who own this will take lots of pictures of themselves? I'm not sure.Anyway, reviewing the rest of the camera...this seems like a pretty mainstream 12MP digital camera. The touch screen didn't seem that much easier, if at all, to use than regular, well-designed menus. Photo quality was average with noise creeping in rapidly as the light diminished. I took a couple of side by side pictures with my older Canon SD550 and a new small Olympus (micro 4/3) DSLR. Not surprisingly image quality for this Samsung was in the middle, but not much better, even zoomed in, than the four year old Canon.So, unless the front LCD is important to you, I'd shop around and it could be that this camera is still your choice, but there are SO many options that it seems to me that the front LCD is the real selling point here. Maybe when these go on discontinued clearance...

Reviews.Title: Duo Screens are Great
Reviews.Author: Julio Nieves
Reviews.Content: Good camera high resolution for detailed pictures. Wish it had more zoom. Over all great if you like to take quick pics of yourself and friends.

Reviews.Title: poor color
Reviews.Author: Paul W. Mcgough "pmcgruff"
Reviews.Content: We are borrowing this camera until we can replace our own.  This camera has a nice look but does not produce good color.  Color was over-saturated and unappealing.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: RaiderFan75 "RaiderFan75"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 15 year old daughter.  She loves this thing.  Matter of fact I love this thing!!  I want it!  It has features I didn't even know existed.  The picture quality is awesome.  So far it has been very durable.  I think you will love this thing as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Bensteen2k"
Reviews.Content: This camera is definitely one of the best purchases I have made. A little pricey but worth every penny (so far). Everyday I discover a new feature, it can almost literally do everything. I highly recommend this device.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 12.2 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Mary Creegan
Reviews.Content: Great product  !!!  My teenager loved the ease of use.  Great pictures.  Will buy one for myself.

Reviews.Title: GREAT pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Greg Tonnis
Reviews.Content: You can take pictures of your self and see what you are doing before you take it. I use this on trips with my 4 year old son. I like to take pictures of us together. this has a lcd monitor on the front and back of the camera. Takes GREAT  stills, flash is very efective in low light, records 1080 HD video comes with built in battery. You just need a micro sd card.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Carlos E. Azuaje Arias "ceaa"
Reviews.Content: very gooditem is OKI likevery goodvery goodvery goodvery goodvery goodvery goodvery good

Reviews.Title: jt
Reviews.Author: JESUS TOVAR
Reviews.Content: VERY good size, color chosen. Adjustable exceed expectations. according to the proper use, recomendado al 100% for other persons, besides excellent

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Ladybug
Reviews.Content: The camera is high quality and takes terrific pictures. I bought this as a gift for someone and they never leave home without it. This is a great choice if you are looking for a camera that can take great pictures and the front camera is a good idea for those who are nervous about asking people to take their picture,you can do it yourself with that feature and the countdown is another cool feature as well.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: Ruthyanne
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera a little over a year and absolutely go gaga over it. It is very cheap and has a high quality. The dual screen is the most awesome feature, I love taking pictures and always have this on me!

Reviews.Title: love this camera!
Reviews.Author: cruzer
Reviews.Content: takes great pictures. HD videos and the microphone works great with picking up the sounds. i recorded subwoofers that were putting out 134.5db and the music, and the subs could be heard with clarity. not like every other youtube video where the sound muffles.the front facing screen is great for my girlfriend who likes to take pictures of us, or whoever else is around

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Rohlf
Reviews.Content: Fast shipping, works great, in great condition. I havent had any problems so far.I was really happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Kray
Reviews.Content: This camera is great and very sturdy. It's fairly easy to use. Ive dropped in it water 2 times but by opening it up letting it air dry for at least a day it returns to its normal working ability.

Reviews.Title: Saved me!
Reviews.Author: Dstak1016
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for my daughter for Christmas in 09.  She doesn't leave home without it! It's always with her.  It recently broke and we have been trying to track the same one down (TL220).  This is the best one, believe me! After searching for hours, and even buying the newer version right from Samsung.com, nothing compared to this one.  We returned the one and I finally came across this seller.  Great price and shipped to me very quickly.  My daughter just got it earlier today before leaving for a concert.  She was so excited and so was I.  The hunt was over thanks to this seller!

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: This is probably my 5th camera in 2 years, and this blows all the other ones away.It takes crystal pictures of scenes and objects. Pictures of yourself turn out very good as well,and are always what your expecting thanks to the front screen which is also great and clear. The camera seems to be very sturdy, and the battery lasts a long time.Great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: i love it !
Reviews.Author: J-rsg
Reviews.Content: I just received mine today and I was so excited ! Its what I expected except that I thought its just really flat and doesn't have the kinda diagonal part of the design on the back, but it still looks cute and I think its for a comfortable handling.I've been reading the reviews and looking it up on the web and comparing it and it's price with a later version and other products for several days before buying it. It was my first choice and chose this one because of the reviews ,style and features ,and I think it fits me best.I was trying this cam for more than an hour and I pretty much know all or much of its features.It takes clear shots and have many features. I especially like the front screen b'coz I love taking self-portraits. I like that you can edit your pic in cam and don't have to use photoshop for some tasks. I will try the child mode if it works for my baby cousin when she come over.It is an awesome camera and I just love it ! =]

Reviews.Title: Awesome product!
Reviews.Author: Laura Ramon
Reviews.Content: I love my front screen camera. I could never take a good pic of myself w/ friends. Now I can!

Reviews.Title: SUPER FUN TIMES
Reviews.Author: bay081
Reviews.Content: I got this as a birthday present for my sister. She love, love, looooves it. It's cool with the touch screen and is VERY nice to have the ability to see yourself when taking a picture of yourself or someone else...NO LONGER DOES SHE HAVE AWKWARD PICTURES WITH HEADS CUT OFF! It also has some sort of slideshow preview thing and slides through pictures like you would do with an ipod touch or any touch phone where you scroll to the side and the picture does as well. All and all I'd HIGHLY recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: spiralni
Reviews.Content: The camera was for my girfriend.. she was enchanted for the gift..The camera is really beautiful, so she is happy with camera so I am

Reviews.Title: Comentario
Reviews.Author: Antonio
Reviews.Content: Muy bueno y bonito producto, y ademas con buena tecnologia en su fabricacion al ofrecer diferentes funciones para el uso.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Kelly A. Hudson
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera.  It has so many cool features especially the front screen.  The pictures are clear and it has a really good zoom.  I love everything about this camera.  One setting you can put it on will take pictures automatically when someone smiles.  It's really neat.  There are also a lot of different modes you can put it in for different environments.  The macro feature takes emaculate up-close pictures. I highly recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: zoom while recording video causes audio to drop out
Reviews.Author: trying to help
Reviews.Content: so... that makes this otherwise handy little camera of no value to me, personally, and I have to return it.

Reviews.Title: camera was so worth it
Reviews.Author: mr_domo_cress
Reviews.Content: i love it came fast and was in great shape and made a great gift and the price i couldnt beat..... love it thanks again

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Lawrence C. Richards Jr.
Reviews.Content: The camera is amazing, I love the fact that it has a picture frame on both sides of it so you can see that everything is in the picture when you take 1 of yourself.

Reviews.Title: Samsung has the worst customer service ever
Reviews.Author: Angry Samsung Customer
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera less than a week ago and just took it out of the box tonight.  The flash doesn't work so we called Samsung technical support for help.  After nearly an hour of talking to people who don't speak English, doing their tests, etc. they told us we can send our brand new, never been used camera, to them for it to be repaired.  Problem is, we bought it for a trip this weekend and the store that we bought it from is an hour and a half away.  Plus, I don't want it repaired.  I want a brand new one that works!  All they would said is "this is our policy."By far the worst customer service experience I've ever had!

Reviews.Title: Not Durable at all! so dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Happy Shopper
Reviews.Content: I have gone through THREE of these cameras, they break for no reason. I am an avid picture taker and was So excited to get this camera with the dual screens so me and my son could take fun pictures as well as me and my friends while we are out. All I did was turn the thing on and the lens got stuck in the on position and the screen wouldnt turn on at all. I took the battery in and out a few times and still nothing. It took great pictures when it did work. But going through 3 of them within 5 months was too much for me. Until Samsung can make a more durable lens (which if you go to best buy or another store to check this out you can feel that the lens is "loose"). I hope this review helps some people.

Reviews.Title: A very good camera
Reviews.Author: Francisco Guerrero
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife and I can tell you it's very good for the price paid, we've taken pictures in almost every scene and they were great. The only down I can think of is the battery life when you turn on the front display, but we'll soon get a second battery to avoid running out of power.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Christopher L. Bowerman "wizz"
Reviews.Content: My daughter bought this camera for her boyfriend for when he goes fishing. He likes it alot but I think my daughter likes it to much as she always has it in her handbag!!! If it lasts longer than the Casio cameras then they will be happy we've had a few of those fail.

Reviews.Title: Works nicely!
Reviews.Author: S. Kimura "sjk"
Reviews.Content: The camera I bought seems to work nicely!  We took it up to the Tram on New Years Eve and even in the cold it worked great!

Reviews.Title: Not Worth the Price
Reviews.Author: JenW0809
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera when it first came out. I was so excited about getting it! I switched from my canon that was only a 10MP camera & it took waaaaay better pictures than this camera. The quality of the pictures were really poor for a 12MP camera...they always came out fuzzy. The screen on the front was cool (the whole reason I got this camera, for kid mode) but the pics were so bad I just quit using it. I recently bought a Fujifilm Finepix 270 & it's awesome! Not too impressed with this camera...The picture quality was VERY disapointing & def not worth over $200! I will never buy a samsung camera again!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Kentcuky Girl
Reviews.Content: I had problems with this camera but Amazon worked with me and I was sent another camera.  First camera would not even charge.  The second camera was fine and my husband likes it.

Reviews.Title: samsung camera
Reviews.Author: Gin Lee-hong
Reviews.Content: The zoom isn't as strong as I would like, but it takes great pictures.  This was a present from Santa, so please stop emailing me about it!  I do not want my daughter to find out!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Cathy Dawson "catd264"
Reviews.Content: Love the new screen on the front of the camera.  Really nice and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: R. Tyler
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 13-year-old daughter and she absolutely loves it.  Haven't had a chance to print any of the pictures, but she has added special effects to some of them.  Great little camera for the money.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Ashley N. Lollis
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera for my daughter and she loves it! I got to play around with it a little myself and I just purchased one for myself. It's a really cool camera.

Reviews.Title: $1,155,000.00 what a bargain for a camera
Reviews.Author: Frank Banister "ectogamit"
Reviews.Content: $1,155,000.00?  I hope this is a typo WOW! Or better be a REALLY nice camera for that price! ANTonline is usually better priced than this ;)

Reviews.Title: Great but
Reviews.Author: Teresa Reyes
Reviews.Content: I am not a pro and the camera is easy to use.  I like especially the touch screen.  The picture is great indoor but sometimes the picture is so bright almost all white on a very low light condition.  Also negative comment is the battery life.  For photos only approx 200 shots which is not much for a wedding party which is all day.  Probably shorter for movies which I haven't tried.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Y. J. Chan
Reviews.Content: Came quickly and arrived on time. Very interesting camera with sufficiently user-friendly controls. 5 stars.I am from London. I bought from the US website because I had coupons to use. However, I ignorantly did not know about the import tax that I had to pay the UK gov through FedEx after the trade, which costs about £34. so may not be a good idea to ship this product to countries with high import tax. still of course, 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Not all that.
Reviews.Author: peachy6080 "peachy6080"
Reviews.Content: Buttons are tiny and you need to use an easily lost wand to scroll through menus on the touch screen.  Almost seems impossible to take a self-portrait with tiny buttons.  Even with the shake features, still got blurry pictures.  They should offer classes with every purchase.

ProductInfo.Features:
1.5 Front LCD
3.0 full touch screen main display
720p HD movie
True dual image stabilization
12.2 Megapixels deliver the sharpest, most lifelike details
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung TL220 12.2MP Dig Camera 4.6X Opt 3 In LCD Blue
